name: Brushin' Biz
description:
A simple light-hearted story set in the 1920s, about cleaning things with a brush.

---------------------------------------------

Made for the 45th Ludum Dare Jam. The theme was "Start with nothing".

---------------------------------------------

Controls

Left Click. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Brushing

Right Click. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Rotate

Options for Auto-Brushing can be found in the in-game options menu.

---------------------------------------------
